source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_00<tab>Moghan is gazing meaningfully at the path to Zenith...
target: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_00<tab>アサー天空廊のモグタンは、話したいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_01<tab>A well-rested Moghan declares that the winds have turned in your favor. After once more instructing you on how to use the horn to summon Hraesvelgr, the moogle bids you a hurried farewell, apparently keen to return to Moghome. You cannot imagine why. Follow the path to Zenith, and blow the horn on the top floor of the palace.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_01<tab>モグタンは、案内を終えて帰っていった。ドラヴァニア雲海の白亜の宮殿にある「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61E99D301 /var>」でラッパを吹こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_02<tab>Hraesvelgr answers the call of the horn, but is displeased to find that his sanctuary has been invaded by the children of man. After scornfully dismissing Ysayle's claims to be Shiva reborn, he rebuffs your calls for peace, and recounts the tale of his brood-sister Ratatoskr's murder and the treachery of King Thordan. Man, he concludes, has brought nothing but misery to dragonkind. With that, the immense creature flies away, leaving you to ponder the cost of Nidhogg's eternal quest for vengeance. Trouble Alphinaud for his thoughts on this ill-starred encounter.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_02<tab>ラッパを吹くと、聖竜フレースヴェルグが現れた。フレースヴェルグから、1000年前の真実と、ニーズヘッグの真意を聞いた。白亜の宮殿の「アルフィノ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_03<tab>Though Hraesvelgr revealed much that was hidden about Ishgard's bloody history, Alphinaud is crushed by the failure of your mission. With your hopes for peace shattered, it is time to consider more desperate measures...
target: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_SEQ_03<tab>アルフィノと話した。彼は、フレースヴェルグの協力を得られなかったことから、次の行動を考えあぐねているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_TODO_00<tab>Blow the horn on the top floor of Zenith.
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_000<tab>The campfire was so cozy... I must have fallen asleep, kupo.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_000焚き火があったかくて、
ついつい眠ってしまったくぽ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_001<tab>But do you feel how the winds have shifted!? They will have borne Hraesvelgr back to the skies above Zenith─I'm sure of it!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_001でも、お陰でいい風が吹いてきたくぽ。
これならきっと、聖竜様も雲海の空に戻ってきてるくぽ。
さあ、「ピカピカのラッパ」の出番くぽ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_002<tab>This is your chance to climb to the highest floor of the palace, and summon him with a toot on that shiny horn! So, uh...I-I'll be heading back now, if it's all the same to you. Good luck, kupo! It was nice knowing you!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_002西の「白亜の宮殿」に行って、
このラッパを、ぷーぷか吹き鳴らせば、聖竜様に会えるくぽ。
それじゃ、モグは村に帰るくぽ！　さよならくぽ～！

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_003<tab>I trust you are well rested, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>? Good. If we are to parley with Hraesvelgr, we shall each have need of the full complement of our wits.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_003)) (( )) 02 /var>、ゆっくり休めたかい？
そろそろ旅も大詰めだ、気を引き締めて行こう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ESTINIEN_000_004<tab>Whenever you are ready, Warrior of Light. Full eager am I to gaze upon this great wyrm.
target: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ESTINIEN_000_004<tab>さて、噂の「七大天竜」の一翼に、ご対面といこうじゃないか。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ICEHEART_000_005<tab>We <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> succeed in winning Hraesvelgr to our cause. Lend me your resolve, Saint Shiva...
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ICEHEART_000_005是が非でも、聖竜との対話を成功させなくては……。
聖女「シヴァ」よ、支えていてください……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_006<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Y-You're <var 1A 02 /var>alive<var 1A 01 /var>! I was worried Hraesvelgr might─ Waaait a moment, kupo. I don't remember hearing any tooting. You haven't summoned him yet...have you? If you haven't, climb to the top of his palace and blow the horn. Oh, and forget what I said. I was rambling. Good luck, kupo!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_MOGHAN_000_006聖竜様には、会えたくぽ？
まだなら「白亜の宮殿」でラッパを、
ぷーぷか吹き鳴らしてくるくぽ！
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ESTINIEN_100_004<tab>さて、噂の「七大天竜」の一翼に、ご対面といこうじゃないか。

TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ICEHEART_100_005是が非でも、聖竜との対話を成功させなくては……。
聖女「シヴァ」よ、支えていてください……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Hraesvelgr was every bit as awe-inspiring as I imagined. His voice fairly dripped with power─the will behind his words so undeniable that it transcended my ignorance of the dragons' tongue. 'Tis but a pity that I misliked what he said.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_010聖竜「フレースヴェルグ」……
さすがは七竜の一翼を担うだけはある。
強大な魔力を以て、直接、意思を伝えてくるなんて……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_011<tab><sigh> So far did we travel─even unto the very heavens themselves─only to be dismissed like unruly children. And far from mitigating this...<var 1A 02 /var>humiliation<var 1A 01 /var>, the hidden truths we have learned serve only to prove that our grand mission of peace was destined to fail from the first.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_011だが、新たな事実を掴んだとはいえ、
聖竜の協力を取り付けることはできなかった……。
せっかく、雲上の世界まで旅してきたというのに……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_012<tab>Nothing will deter Nidhogg from his course.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ALPHINAUD_000_012邪竜「ニーズヘッグ」を止めるには、
どうすればいいのだ……。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ESTINIEN_000_013<tab>As predicted, Iceheart's faith in the wyrm was misplaced. Which leaves us with but one recourse. You know I have the right of it, Warrior of Light.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ESTINIEN_000_013「氷の巫女」の思惑は外れたな。
……となれば、やることはひとつだけだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ICEHEART_000_014<tab>What false god is this Shiva? What manner of phantom have I welcomed into my heart...?
target:
TEXT_HEAVNA326_01627_ICEHEART_000_014私が感じたシヴァの心は……
すべては……幻想だったというのか……。
